name: SimCity 2000
description: SimCity 2000 puts an entire city in the palm of your hand.SimCity 2000 lets you create, build, and run a city of your own.Take on the role as a mayor and call the shots for the entire city.You'll have to keep up on the housing, industries, mass transportation, and commerce to attract potential citizens.And just when you think you have it under control, a natural disaster or alien invasion may occur to set you back.However, if you can conquer all of these problems, you just might be able to turn a small town into a thriving metropolis.
